name: Ext_R3_ExpansionProfile_url
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExpansionProfile.url for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ExpansionProfile.url from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExpansionProfile|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Logical URI to reference this expansion profile (globally unique)
element.definition: An absolute URI that is used to identify this expansion profile when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this expansion profile is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the expansion profile. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](https://hl7.org/fhir/resource..html#versions).
